thread.title: Jaguar Land Rover Launches Made In India XF At Rs. 47.5 Lakh
thread.title_full: Jaguar Land Rover Launches Made In India XF At Rs. 47.5 Lakh

title: Jaguar Land Rover Launches Made In India XF At Rs. 47.5 Lakh
text:
Jaguar Land Rover Launches Made In India XF At Rs. 47.5 Lakh A Treat For Petrolheads And Patriots At The Same Time Print   Quick Take 
If you’re darn serious about your wheels and look into every single detail that goes behind making the car of your dreams, and at the same time proud of incredible India, well this news is definitely gonna make you happy. 
Jaguar Land Rover India recently announced (on Feb 23, 2017, to be precise) the start of local manufacturing of the new Jaguar XF at its Pune plant. With a price tag starting from Rs. 47.50 lakh going up to 60.5 lakh (ex-showroom Delhi), Jag's latest launch somewhat sweetly priced at least for starters. 
The made in India Jaguar XF will be available in a 2.0l Ingenium diesel engine with a power output of 132 kW, and a 2.0l petrol engine with a power output of 177 kW. The new XF will be available in three variants: Pure, Prestige, and Portfolio, in both diesel and petrol options. 
The mean machine will also come with a slew of advanced tech features including InControl Touch Pro with a 25.9 cm touchscreen infotainment system and a Meridian Sound System. 
While there’s no complaint regarding the British Jaguar Land Rover imported cars, barring the ridiculously hefty import duties of course, we’re definitely happier with the XF now being actually produced in India. All said and done, there’s nothing quite like flashing a beast that’s a power machine, and proudly bears the ‘Made in India’ tag. 
Managing director and president of Jaguar Land Rover India, was quoted saying: “Since its introduction in 2009, the Jaguar XF has gained immense popularity and success in the country. The introduction of the all-new Jaguar XF into our locally manufactured portfolio reiterates our commitment to the Indian market.” 
The Jaguar range in India (and we see the number of them on Indian roads steadily increasing) includes the imported F-TYPE starting at Rs. 1.25 crore, the locally manufactured XJ starting at Rs. 99.99 lakh, the F-PACE priced at Rs. 68.40 lakh, and the locally manufactured XE starting at Rs. 39.9 lakh (all ex-showroom Delhi prices). 
And now you can book the brand new Indian Jaguar XF across 24 authorised Jag retail outlets in India. Or better still, click here for a quick online booking.
